versions.content:
Assignment Letter

Dear {{employee_name}},

This Assignment Letter confirms the terms and conditions of your international assignment with {{company_name}}. Please review the details below, which will apply for the duration of your assignment, and sign to indicate your acceptance.

Assignment Details:

  • Position Title: {{position_title}}
  • Assignment Location: {{assignment_location}}
  • Start Date: {{start_date}}
  • End Date (Estimated): {{assignment_end_date}}
  • Reporting Manager: {{manager_name}}

Compensation and Benefits:

You will continue to receive your base salary of {{base_salary}}. In addition, you will be provided with the following assignment benefits: {{benefits_list}}.

Tax Arrangements:

Your assignment will be administered under our expatriate tax policy. {{tax_terms}}

Immigration and Work Authorization:

The company will sponsor and facilitate your work authorization for {{assignment_location}}. {{immigration_details}}

Compliance Requirements:

You are expected to adhere to all applicable {{compliance_requirements}} during your assignment.

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}
versions.changeDescription: Initial version with comprehensive international assignment details

versions.content:
Assignment Extension Agreement

Dear {{employee_name}},

We refer to your international assignment in {{assignment_location}} that commenced on {{start_date}}. As discussed, {{company_name}} wishes to extend your assignment. This Assignment Extension Agreement outlines the updated terms.

Extended Assignment Details:

  • Extended End Date: {{extended_end_date}}
  • Position Title: {{position_title}}
  • Assignment Location: {{assignment_location}}
  • Reporting Manager: {{manager_name}}

Compensation and Benefits:

For the extension period, your base salary will remain at {{base_salary}}, and you will continue to receive assignment benefits: {{benefits_list}}.

Other Terms:

All other terms, including tax equalization ({{tax_terms}}), compliance ({{compliance_requirements}}), and immigration support ({{immigration_details}}) continue to apply.

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}
versions.changeDescription: Initial version with updated extension details

versions.content:
Repatriation Agreement

Dear {{employee_name}},

As your assignment in {{assignment_location}} comes to a close, this Repatriation Agreement outlines your return to your home location.

Repatriation Details:

  • Assignment End Date: {{assignment_end_date}}
  • Effective Date: {{effective_date}}
  • Home Location: {{home_location}}
  • Position Title upon Return: {{position_title}}
  • Reporting Manager: {{manager_name}}

Repatriation Assistance:

You are eligible for repatriation benefits: {{benefits_list}}.

Tax and Compliance:

Your participation in tax equalization ({{tax_terms}}) and compliance requirements ({{compliance_requirements}}) will conclude upon repatriation.

Immigration:

We will coordinate the closure of your work authorization. {{immigration_details}}

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}

Tax Equalization Agreement

Employee: {{employee_name}}
Home Country: {{home_country}}
Host Country (Assignment Location): {{assignment_location}}
Assignment Start Date: {{start_date}}
Assignment End Date: {{assignment_end_date}}
Effective Date of Agreement: {{effective_date}}

1. Purpose

This agreement ensures you incur no financial gain or loss due to tax differences.

2. Company Responsibilities:

{{company_name}} will manage host country tax payments and provide tax preparation services.

3. Employee Responsibilities:

You agree to the hypothetical tax deductions as outlined: {{tax_terms}}. Also, comply with {{compliance_requirements}}.

By signing, you acknowledge your understanding of these terms.

{{hr_representative}}
versions.changeDescription: Initial version detailing tax equalization terms

versions.content:
Immigration Support Letter

To Whom It May Concern,

Subject: Work Assignment Confirmation â€“ {{employee_name}} (Passport No: {{passport_number}})

This letter supports the work permit/visa application for {{employee_name}}. {{employee_name}} holds the position of {{position_title}} with {{company_name}} and is assigned to {{assignment_location}} starting on {{start_date}}, with an expected assignment duration of {{assignment_duration}}, ending on {{assignment_end_date}}.

Upon assignment, {{employee_name}} will report to {{manager_name}} and receive a base salary of {{base_salary}}. The host entity, {{host_company_name}}, will facilitate local operations.

For immigration support, please note the following: {{immigration_details}}. The required visa type is {{visa_type}}.

For further details, please contact {{hr_representative}}.

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}

Short-term Assignment Agreement

Dear {{employee_name}},

This Short-term Assignment Agreement confirms the terms of your temporary assignment with {{company_name}}. Please review the details below and sign to acknowledge your acceptance.

Assignment Details:

  • Position Title: {{position_title}}
  • Assignment Location: {{assignment_location}}
  • Start Date: {{start_date}}
  • End Date: {{assignment_end_date}}
  • Reporting Manager: {{manager_name}}

Compensation and Benefits:

You will receive a base salary of {{base_salary}} and the following benefits for this short-term assignment: {{benefits_list}}.

Additional Terms:

This assignment is subject to specific tax terms ({{tax_terms}}), compliance requirements ({{compliance_requirements}}), and immigration support ({{immigration_details}}).

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}

Commuter Agreement

Dear {{employee_name}},

This Commuter Agreement outlines the terms for your daily commute to work at {{assignment_location}}. Your work schedule is as follows:

Work Schedule:

{{work_schedule}}

Reimbursements:

You are eligible for a commuting reimbursement of {{commute_reimbursement}}. Please adhere to the guidelines provided by {{company_name}}.

For any queries, please contact your reporting manager, {{manager_name}}, or {{hr_representative}}.

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}

Business Trip Agreement

Dear {{employee_name}},

This Business Trip Agreement confirms your upcoming business trip to {{assignment_location}}. The trip is scheduled from {{start_date}} to {{assignment_end_date}}.

Details:

  • Position Title: {{position_title}}
  • Per Diem: {{per_diem}}
  • Reporting Manager: {{manager_name}}

Travel and Expense:

Your travel arrangements have been coordinated by {{company_name}}, and you are eligible for a per diem allowance of {{per_diem}} during the trip.

Please contact {{hr_representative}} for any further information or adjustments.

Sincerely,
{{hr_representative}}
versions.changeDescription: Initial version for business trip agreement

caseData.benefits_list: Housing allowance, relocation support, and annual bonus
caseData.immigration_details: Visa sponsorship and work permit processing provided.
caseData.compliance_requirements: local labour laws and company policies.
